title: Game Crashes
body: As soon as I get into the game (post loading screen), after about 3 seconds the game freezes and making a weird noise and my entire laptop freezes and requires a full reset. I've tried running a PC cleaner, deleting programs, reinstalling league. Help would be nice.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be experiencing the issue with Windows 10 and the game bar. The recent Windows 10 Anniversary update enabled the game DVR feature by default and can cause issues with system freezes. I recommend disabling the game bar with [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it resolved the issue.

Let me know if this worked.
